org.middleheaven.domain.store
Interface DomainStoreService

All Known Implementing Classes:
HashDomainStoreService
@Service
public interface DomainStoreService

A Service to register and retrieve DomainStores.

Method Summary
 DomainStore getStore()
          Return the first registered DomainStore instance allocated to the current transaction.
 DomainStore getStore(java.lang.String name)
          Return the registered DomainStore that matches the given name.
 void registerStore(java.lang.String name, DomainStoreManager domainStoreManager)
          Register a DomainStore implementation with a given name.
 void unRegisterAll()
          Unregister all previously registered DomainStores.
 void unRegisterStore(java.lang.String name)
          Unregister the DomainStore with the given name, if it exists.
 

Method Detail

registerStore

void registerStore(java.lang.String name,
                   DomainStoreManager domainStoreManager)
Register a DomainStore implementation with a given name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the DomainStore.
domainStoreManager - the DomainStoreManager implementation that will manage the store

unRegisterStore

void unRegisterStore(java.lang.String name)
Unregister the DomainStore with the given name, if it exists.

Parameters:
name - the name of the DomainStore.

unRegisterAll

void unRegisterAll()
Unregister all previously registered DomainStores.

getStore

DomainStore getStore()
Return the first registered DomainStore instance allocated to the current transaction.

Returns:
the first registered DomainStore.

getStore

DomainStore getStore(java.lang.String name)
Return the registered DomainStore that matches the given name.

Parameters:
name - the DomainStore name.
Returns:
the DomainStore found, or null if none is found.
